item.description: [CNW Group] - Sierra Metals reports November production of 75,452 tonnes at its Yauricocha Mine in Peru

item.title: Sierra Metals reports November production of 75,452 tonnes at its Yauricocha Mine in Peru
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Dec. 5, 2016 /PRNewswire/ - Sierra Metals Inc. (SMT.TO) (SMT) ("Sierra Metals" or "the Company") is very pleased to report the production of 75,452 tonnes from the Chumpe Mill located at the Yauricocha Mine in Peru in spite of the Company's planned shut down for the installation of a larger capacity hoist at the Mascota shaft.
